name: Space Launch Simulator | The Trampoline Is Working
name_original: Space Launch Simulator | The Trampoline Is Working
description:
Always dreamed to experience a flight to space but never had a few spare million bucks?
This game inspired by recent Elon Musk's achievement, represents being in typical space craft launching from ground, passing through clouds, and giving you ability to see the Earth from space. Get in a virtual space ship, fasten your belts and enjoy a full featured space flight.


Featuring

-Immersive first person space flight
-Make a jump from stratosphere
-Fly from city streets to space like a superhuman
-Good graphics
-Realistic scale planet
-Ability to walk inside the rocket while it moves
-Support for Virtual Reality headsets
-Unique experience
-Achievements
